title: Flight Simulator 2020 -MSFS Update - 40th Anniversary Edition announced
description:
In this video we will review the announcements which have been made just an hour ago during the Xbox and Bethesda Showcase 2022. The good thing is that we can expect a lot of additional aircrafts and helicopters from different types. Additionally some legacy locations which were part of Flight Simulator X and Flight Simulator 2004 will be added with this update. The 40th Anniversary Edition will be available in November.

tags: Next huge update for MSFS will be available in November
Airbus A310 will be available for free for MSFS later this year
